reliquary:BoilingFlask.NAME: Boiling Flask
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, if your potion slots are full, choose a #yVapor and add it into your hand.

reliquary:Bookmark.NAME: Bookmark
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, draw an extra card for each #yInnate card in your deck.

reliquary:Boomerang.NAME: Boomerang
DESCRIPTIONS: Put the first card you play each turn on top of your draw pile.

reliquary:BrokenClock.NAME: Broken Clock
DESCRIPTIONS: Each combat starts with two player turns, then two enemy turns.

reliquary:Ember.NAME: Ember
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Take #b1 damage for each [E] beyond the third you spend each turn.

reliquary:ExpiredCoupon.NAME: Expired Coupon
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you reach #b
or more total unblocked damage in a combat, deals #b
damage to all enemies.

reliquary:FeatherDuster.NAME: Feather Duster
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, remove any number of cards from your deck except Strike, Defend, and #rCurse cards.
Select any number of cards to remove.

reliquary:Firecrackers.NAME: Firecrackers
DESCRIPTIONS: Overkill damage is dealt to all other enemies.

reliquary:IridiumChain.NAME: Iridium Chain
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yPower card, put an #yEthereal copy into your hand that costs #b1 more.
Ethereal. NL

reliquary:JackalopeAntler.NAME: Jackalope Antler
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy dies, refund the Energy cost of the last card you played.

reliquary:KinkedSpring.NAME: Kinked Spring
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Your discard pile can't shuffle into your draw pile during your turn.

reliquary:Knoch.NAME: Knoch
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies with #b25% or less health are #yWeak.

reliquary:MedicineBall.NAME: Medicine Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: You have additional #yStrength equal to your enemies' combined #yStrength.

reliquary:MudwinsCradle.NAME: Mudwin's Cradle
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you exit #yDivinity, gain #b2 #yMantra for each time you entered #yDivinity this combat (max 9).

reliquary:OuijaBoard.NAME: Ouija Board
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click this once each turn to play a card from your discard pile with random targets and shuffle it into your draw pile. It costs [E] more.

reliquary:PorcupineQuills.NAME: Porcupine Quills
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive #b12 or more unblocked damage, deal that much damage back.

reliquary:PurpleTingedLeaf.NAME: Purple-Tinged Leaf
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card. Whenever you play that card, heal #b1 HP.
Whenever you play the chosen
, heal #b1 HP.

reliquary:RadioactivePellet.NAME: Radioactive Pellet
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPoison doesn't decrement.

reliquary:RedPaperclip.NAME: Red Paperclip
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Replaces a random Common relic.

reliquary:RoseTintedGlasses.NAME: Rose-Tinted Glasses
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #b2 times you draw a #yStatus each combat, #yExhaust it and draw a card.

reliquary:RosewoodLute.NAME: Rosewood Lute
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you block damage exactly, gain #b1 [E] next turn.

reliquary:QuartzCube.NAME: Quartz Cube
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat with #b2 or more enemies, apply #b2 #yStunned to one. It can't be damaged while #yStunned.

reliquary:SculptingSteel.NAME: Sculpting Steel
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, becomes a copy of a relic you already have.

reliquary:ShortFuse.NAME: Short Fuse
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yLightning Orbs target the enemy with the least HP.

reliquary:SilkGlove.NAME: Silk Glove
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would discard a single card at the end of your turn, #yRetain it.

reliquary:Stiletto.NAME: Stiletto
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yAttacks deal double damage to enemies' #yBlock.

reliquary:TatteredRug.NAME: Tattered Rug
DESCRIPTIONS: You can sell potions to the Merchant.
Sell for
Gold
I'll take it!
You got yourself a deal!

Ah! I'll buy it at a high price!
Gimme!
I'd be a fool @not@ to buy it!
You drive a hard bargain...

reliquary:TridentHead.NAME: Trident Head
reliquary:TridentHead.FLAVOR: A part of the weapon wielded by the fabled Wave King.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play on a single enemy each combat is copied to all other enemies.

reliquary:WritOfMandamus.NAME: Writ of Mandamus
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of your turn, you lose #b
#yBlock.
